channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: facebookresearch /segment-anything | Jupyter Notebook | 50,951
item.description: The repository provides code for running inference with the SegmentAnything Model (SAM), links for downloading the trained model checkpoints, and example notebooks that show how to use the model.

item.title: TomBursch /kitchenowl | Dart | 2,370
item.description: KitchenOwl is a self-hosted grocery list and recipe manager. The backend is made with Flask and the frontend with Flutter. Easily add items to your shopping list before you go shopping. You can also create recipes and add items based on what you want to cook.

item.title: nicklockwood /SwiftFormat | Swift | 8,398
item.description: A command-line tool and Xcode Extension for formatting Swift code

item.title: rustdesk /rustdesk | Rust | 93,161
item.description: An open-source remote desktop application designed for self-hosting, as an alternative to TeamViewer.

item.title: lastmile-ai /mcp-agent | Python | 6,438
item.description: Build effective agents using Model Context Protocol and simple workflow patterns

item.title: aws /amazon-q-developer-cli | Rust | 1,158

item.title: OpenPipe /ART | Python | 2,680
item.description: Agent Reinforcement Trainer: train multi-step agents for real-world tasks using GRPO. Give your agents on-the-job training. Reinforcement learning for Qwen2.5, Qwen3, Llama, Kimi, and more!

item.title: anthropics /claude-code | PowerShell | 23,742
item.description: Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

item.title: arc53 /DocsGPT | TypeScript | 16,105
item.description: DocsGPT is an open-source genAI tool that helps users get reliable answers from knowledge source, while avoiding hallucinations. It enables private and reliable information retrieval, with tooling and agentic system capability built in.

item.description: Chat with your documents on your local device using GPT models. No data leaves your device and 100% private.
